originalText.text:
I‚Äôve never been to the physical store. However, I made two online purchases with Alessandro. He‚Äôs been a great help both times. He always puts his best effort into making the process flawless. We needed a gift rushed and his willingness to make it happen is top notch.
As far as the item quality, the stones were shining like little stars. The items were not for me and not my style. However, I definitely wished they were mine üòÖ It‚Äôs been more than a year since the first items arrived and they‚Äôre still in perfect condition.
I highly recommend working with this company. The prices are pretty reasonable for the quality. You‚Äôll not be disappointed. 10/10 ‚≠êÔ∏è

originalText.text: Purchased a silver necklace at the Aruba location. The chain twisted oddly while wearing and the links got kinked and bent. Their customer service was great, they fixed it and sent it back to us quickly. No complaints from me.

text.text: Purchased a silver necklace at the Aruba location. The chain twisted oddly while wearing and the links got kinked and bent. Their customer service was great, they fixed it and sent it back to us quickly. No complaints from me.

originalText.text:
Purchased a men's leather bracelet in late February in Emerald Columbian Jewelry store in Barbados. Within 3 months, the blue leather faded. I never wore in shower or swimming. When I returned, they told me it was excessive wear and tear so not covered. This was August 9th, so not even 6 months old. Oh, but for 1/2 the price I paid, they would replace it with the same merchandise.

Very poor quality and lifetime warranty is worth nothing. I will never purchase their merchandise again.

originalText.text: We have spent quite a bit of money buying Effy jewelry. They do have beautiful pieces and so my husband bought me a very expensive yellow Diamond from the Effy store on the Royal Princess for our 43rd anniversary. I had it six months when I discovered a small pave Diamond had fallen out. Effy has honored their warranty to fix it so I mailed my ring to them for repair. I did not get an email confirming it had been received at Effy until I contacted them after 10 days of worrying it was lost. It has now been over six weeks that they‚Äôve had my ring so I contacted them again asking for an update. I was told my ring is ready to ship back to me once I confirm address. I confirmed shipping address two days ago with no response  back. I have not received ring yet so I am hoping the repair will last and I will have no more issues with the ring. To have a ring only 6 months, then to be without for almost 2 months is disheartening. This ring is probably nothing to them since they are around jewelry constantly but it was a lot of money to us. I am certain after much research that it is not of the value that we paid but I love it. I wish Effy would have been a more responsive and keep me updated about something that is valuable to me. Would we buy again, most likely not.

originalText.text: Eight months ago, in October 2022, I purchased a ring/bracelet set at the EFFY Jewelry store onboard the Tropical Caribbean cruise on Holland America.  I made an exchange and EFFY ended up owing me a credit of $396.25, which they promised to refund  to my credit card. Many letters/emails and phone calls later have been to no avail. Furthermore, the piece on the ring which holds the diamonds, broke off.  Beware of purchasing any jewelry from EFFY.  Their quality is poor and they have been dishonest and unreputable in dealing with me.  You may be the next victim who loses money too.
